In this task, you are given a tweet that contains irony. You must classify the type of irony the tweet has. There are three types of irony: polarity, situational, and other. Polarity irony happens when irony is achieved by inverting the intended sentence. Situational irony happens when a situation fails to meet some expectations. Other kinds of irony are neither polarity nor situational. Note that URLs in the text have been replaced with [Link].

A verb refers to an intention only if it refers to an event planned to happen in the future and is not conditional (or part of a condition).
